coreAttributes.name: Eevee Switch
coreAttributes.description: Transformation into one of the feral eevee evolution. Reusing an item switches eevee subraces. At the very end, you become a morph.

effectTooltipLines.line: Transformation into one of the feral eevee evolution

coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.isFeral()==false && npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Sylveon) [##npc.setFeral(SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee)] [##npc.setPenisSize(0.16*npc.getHeightValue())] [##npc.setPenisGirth(6)] [##npc.setTesticleSize(2)]

[npc.Name] is now feral Eevee.

#ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Vaporeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Jolteon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Flareon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Espeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Umbreon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Leafeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Glaceon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Sylveon) [##npc.setFeral(SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee)] [##npc.setPenisSize(0.17*npc.getHeightValue())] [##npc.setPenisGirth(6)] [##npc.setTesticleSize(2)]

[npc.Name] is now feral Eevee.

#ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Vaporeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Jolteon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Flareon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Espeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Umbreon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Leafeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Glaceon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Sylveon) [##npc.setFeral(SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Vaporeon)] [##npc.setPenisSize(0.16*npc.getHeightValue())] [##npc.setPenisGirth(4)] [##npc.setTesticleSize(2)]

[npc.Name] is now feral Vaporeon.

#ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee && npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Vaporeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Jolteon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Flareon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Espeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Umbreon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Leafeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Glaceon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Sylveon) [##npc.setFeral(SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Jolteon)] [##npc.setPenisSize(0.16*npc.getHeightValue())] [##npc.setPenisGirth(5)] [##npc.setTesticleSize(2)]

[npc.Name] is now feral Jolteon.

#ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Vaporeon && npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Jolteon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Flareon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Espeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Umbreon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Leafeon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Glaceon && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Sylveon) [##npc.setFeral(SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Flareon)] [##npc.setPenisSize(0.16*npc.getHeightValue())] [##npc.setPenisGirth(5)] [##npc.setTesticleSize(2)]
